title: South Portland integrative health | Maine deep tissue Massage
description: In Balance in South Portland, ME is the Greater Portland area's source for health coaching, Deep Tissue Massage and much more!
cleaned_text: Effective May 1, 2023, I am no longer offering therapeutic massage or infrared sauna. Welcome to In Balance! My name is Marianne. I am a registered nurse, integrative medicine health coach and bodyworker. I work with people to help them achieve a healthy and balanced life. I utilize an integrative approach that draws from both traditional and complementary modalities. I can help you identify the root cause of your symptoms and together we create a plan to help you reclaim your health and wellness. Located within Elm Street Wellness in South Portland, my office is convenient to Portland, Scarborough and Cape Elizabeth. I look forward to seeing you!
